Section.name: About GITAM
Section.description:
Established in 2008, the Gandhi Institute of Technology and Management, GITAM is situated in Bhubaneshwar, Odisha with the approval of AICTE, New Delhi and is affiliated to Biju Pattnaik University of Technology. The college is working under Vidya Bikash Educational Trust with the aim to to provide quality technical education.
The institution is laid out over 16 acres of land at Gangapada, Bhubaneswar, Odisha. The college highly emphasizes on the quality of the education. Research work is going on over several subjects by the research oriented faculty members.
International standard lab facilities, well-furnished hostels for boys and girls, transport facility and other important facilities are available at the campus so that the students feel that they are not away from their home.

Library :
The library is housed in the campus with great collection of text books as well as reference books. Along with the central library, e-library facility is also available so that the students can take full advantage of the library.
